mapper.select: SELECT t.tlCode, t.tlTitle, t.tlContent, t.tlTime, u.nickname, e.emRankCode, e.emComName, (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timelinelike WHERE tlCode = t.tlCode) as timelinelikecount, tl.tlLikeId, (SELECT nickname FROM user su WHERE tl.tlLikeId = su.userId) as timelinelikenickname FROM timeline t LEFT JOIN user u ON t.tlId = u.userId LEFT JOIN employee e ON u.userId = e.emUserId LEFT JOIN timelinelike tl ON tl.tlCode = t.tlCode ORDER BY t.tlTime DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timeline (tlId, tlTitle, tlContent, tlTime) VALUES (#{tlId}, #{tlTitle}, #{tlContent}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT tr.tlReCode, tr.tlCode, tr.tlReId, tr.tlReContent, tr.tlReTime, (SELECT u.nickname FROM user u WHERE u.userId = tr.tlReId ) nickname FROM timelinereply tr WHERE tr.tlCode = #{tlCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timelinereply (tlCode, tlReId, tlReContent, tlReTime) VALUES (#{tlCode}, #{tlReId}, #{tlReContent}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT t.tlCode, t.tlTitle, t.tlContent, t.tlTime, u.nickname, t.tlId, (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timelinelike WHERE tlCode = t.tlCode) as timelinelikecount, tl.tlLikeId, (SELECT nickname FROM user su WHERE tl.tlLikeId = su.userId) as timelinelikenickname, (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timeline st WHERE st.tlId = #{tlId} ) as totaltimelinecount FROM timeline t INNER JOIN user u ON t.tlId = u.userId LEFT JOIN timelinelike tl ON tl.tlCode = t.tlCode WHERE t.tlId = #{tlId} ORDER BY t.tlTime DESC

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timeline st where st.tlTime >= date_add(now(), interval -0 day) and st.tlId = #{tlId}) as daycount, (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timeline st where st.tlTime >= date_add(now(), interval -7 day) and st.tlId = #{tlId}) as oneweekcount, (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timeline st where st.tlTime >= date_add(now(), interval -14 day) and st.tlId = #{tlId}) as twoweekcount, (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timeline st where st.tlTime >= date_add(now(), interval -21 day) and st.tlId = #{tlId}) as threeweekcount, (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timeline st where st.tlTime >= date_add(now(), interval -28 day) and st.tlId = #{tlId}) as fourweekcount, (SELECT COUNT(tlCode) FROM timeline st where st.tlTime >= date_add(now(), interval -30 day) and st.tlId = #{tlId}) as onemonthcount

SELECT m.msgCode, m.msgTitle, m.msgContent, m.msgCheck, m.msgSendId, m.msgReceiveId, m.msgTime, u.name, u.nickname FROM message m INNER JOIN user u ON m.msgSendId = u.userId WHERE msgReceiveId = #{msgReceiveId} ORDER BY m.msgTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET msgCheck=1 WHERE msgCode = #{msgCode}
